title: Nieuwjaarsuitdaging
description: Begin 2025 op een goede manier. Sluit alle drie je ringen zeven dagen op een rij in januari.

title: Veterans Day Challenge
description: Earn this award on November 11 by doing any workout for 11 minutes or more. Record your time with the Workout app or any app that adds workouts to Health.
challengeType: Total number of workouts with minimum duration

title: Mental Health Day Challenge
description: Let’s bring awareness to all the ways we can take care of our mental health. On October 10, record 10 mindful minutes with any app that adds to Health to get this award.

title: National Parks Challenge
description: On August 25, let’s celebrate national parks around the world. Earn this award by recording any workout of 20 minutes or more with any app that adds workouts to Health.
challengeType: Total number of workouts with minimum duration

title: National Fitness Day Challenge
description: Get active for National Fitness Day! On August 8, earn this award by doing any workout for at least 20 minutes. Record your time in the Workout app or any app that adds workouts to Health.
challengeType: Total number of workouts with minimum duration

title: Yoga Day Challenge
description: Find your flow on International Day of Yoga. On June 21, do a yoga workout of 10 minutes or more and you’ll earn this award. Record it with the Workout app or any app that adds workouts to Health.
challengeType: Total number of a specific workout

title: Running Day Challenge
description: Hit the road, trail, track, or tread for Global Running Day! Record a running workout and go at least 5 km on June 5 to earn this special badge.
challengeType: Total number of a specific workout

title: World Meditation Day Challenge
description: Let’s celebrate World Meditation Day! On May 21, record 5 mindful minutes or more with the Mindfulness app or any app that adds mindful minutes to Health to earn this special badge.

title: International Dance Day Challenge
description: Earn this award by recording a Dance workout of 20 minutes or more on International Dance Day, April 29. Record it with the Workout app or any app that adds workouts to Health.
challengeType: Total number of a specific workout

title: Earth Day Challenge
description: Let’s get moving for the planet. On April 22, do any workout for 30 minutes or more to earn this award. Record it with the Workout app or any app that adds to Health.
challengeType: Total number of workouts with minimum duration

title: Heart Month Challenge
description: This Valentine’s day, it’s all about heart. Close your Exercise ring on February 14 to get this award.

title: Ring in the New Year Challenge
description: Let’s go for it in 2024. Earn this award by closing all three rings for seven days in a row in January.
